messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] No desire
messages.msgSnippet: Janene s jeans all have holes in the knees because she plays Warriors, all the time!  She has read every book out. She plays the game on the computer, as well.
messages.messageBody:
Janene's jeans all have holes in the knees because she plays Warriors, all the time! She has read every book out.

She plays the game on the computer, as well.

Joylyn

messages.subject: Re: No desire
messages.msgSnippet: Crystal, thanks for the blog link too.  I ordered the freekids book that you mentioned in the blog about bullying.  Unschooling is such a radical thing in the
messages.messageBody:
Crystal, thanks for the blog link too. I ordered the freekids book
that you mentioned in the blog about bullying. Unschooling is such a
radical thing in the area that I live in. It helps me to have books
around that will remind me that we're not alone. Caitlin does read the
mangas. She usually reads them in the bookstore so we don't have to
buy a copy!

messages.subject: No desire
messages.messageBody:
<<Have you guys got the manga comics? There's a new one about Tigerstar and
Sasha coming out soon.>>

Sorscha is reading over my shoulder and says to type, "Tell Michelle, HI.
And yes, I have the manga but what is the Tigerstar & Sasha? I know Sasha is
Hawkfrost and Mothwings Mother and Tigerstar is their Father - it's kind of
weird but Tigerstar is also Brambleclaw & Tawnypelts Father too - so their
kin. But is that the new book that is coming out on September 2nd?"

Okay Crystal's back here, 'sidetrack' on that thread but I do have input
about 'no desire'. Sorscha just finished going through a 'no desire' period
that lasted about a year. I also just finished a good 7-month period where
I VANISHED! Yup, I'm magic like that. Both Sorscha & I are now, 'back in
the saddle of life' and exploring passion after passion. I find it is a
normal rhythm for me and her - on / off, on /off, etc. etc. Cocooning is a
time of processing for us. We need a good long time to detox after periods
of excitement.
~Crystal~
http://livingtheliquidlife.blogspot.com/
